short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AEM Quickjump allows users to easily and quickly access the publish page of a given author page in AEM

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AEM Quickjump is a Chrome extension that allows users to easily and quickly access the publish page of a given author page in Adobe Experience Manager (AEM). It provides a convenient way to navigate and view the published version of an author page without manually searching for the right URL. Accessing the published page in AEM is made faster and more efficient with AEM Quickjump. The context menu provides a settings/options page for configuring the sites and paths which needs to be truncated.
